heading: HB08288
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING THE DISPOSAL OF ELECTRONIC DEVICES AT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT FACILITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2018-09-25
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08288
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE DISPOSAL OF ELECTRONIC DEVICES AT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT FACILITIES
ABSTRACT : Refers “Electronic Device” to a desktop or laptop computer, computer monitor, portable computer, cathode ray tube, flat panel television, or cellular phones. Intends to prohibit the disposal of any electronic device in mixed solid waste; and prohibit Solid Waste Management Facility to accept for disposal or incineration of any such device.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLARICA, LINABELLE RUTH R.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2018-10-15)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY ON 2018-09-25
